introduction.firstPage: "Interview Helper" is a dynamic app for tech job seekers and professionals, covering 19 key areas like Flutter&Dart, Go, C++, C#, Cybersecurity, and more. It offers extensive resources such as books, tutorials, and interactive exercises in each category, aimed at deepening your grasp of these technologies.
introduction.secondPage: This app covers various technologies and programming languages, providing interview questions for junior to senior levels. It`s a thorough guide for interview prep, boosting your tech skills and readiness for job interviews.
